message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for $95. I think it's a great deal and you'll be very happy with it.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate it. I'm willing to pay $85 for the product.
Thanks for your offer, Bob.  I'm willing to come down a bit to $90.  I believe this product is worth every penny, and I'm confident you'll agree once you have it.
I appreciate your offer, Alice. I would like to counter with $87 for the product.
